import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Params } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-airbnb1', templateUrl: './airbnb1.component.html', styleUrls: ['./airbnb1.component.css'], }) export class Airbnb1Component { }
